comments.author: Alex Deparvu
comments.body:
The initial fix had some regression problems. I fixed that, also added a new test.
(on trunk in revision  #1142693 , on 2.2 in revision #1142696).

comments.body: incomplete fix. there are still usecases that do not work.

comments.author: Alex Deparvu
comments.body: finally closing this, as the tests seem to be ok

description: There are still some issues with Joins that have OR clauses in them. I changed the test, so that it reflects the changes
summary: SQL2 Join with OR clause still has some issues
